title: Mohini Pearl Jhumka: Rose Gold Finish CZ Earrings
materials: Base metal with rose gold finish. Adorned with Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features high-quality artificial pearls (moti).
features: Classic Jhumka design with a floral motif. The intricate setting showcases a dazzling array of CZ stones. Accented with three lustrous pearl drops for a touch of elegance. The rose gold finish adds a modern touch to the traditional silhouette.
colors: with sparkling white CZ stones and light pink gemstones in the center. The pearl drops are a creamy white
occasions: and other special occasions. Its elegant design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: Combines the charm of traditional South Indian Jhumkas with a modern rose gold finish. High-quality CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle. The lustrous pearl drops add a touch of sophistication. This versatile piece can be paired with a Kanjeevaram saree or a modern evening gown.
